findings.title: Uninitialized State Index DoS From Reward Activation
findings.description: The initial supply-side index is configured on the conditions of atlantisSupplyState[address(aToken)].index == 0 and atlantisSupplyState[address(aToken)].block == 0, but for an already listed market with a current speed of 0, the first condition is indeed met while the second condition does not!

findings.title: Non ERC20-Compliance Of AToken
findings.description: The AToken contract does not fully comply with the ERC20 specification, which may cause incompatibility issues with DeFi protocols.

findings.title: Proper dsrPerBlock() Calculation
findings.description: The `dsrPerBlock()` function assumes a block time of 15 seconds per block on Binance Smart Chain (BSC), which is incorrect.

findings.title: Interface Inconsistency Between ABep20 And ABNB
findings.description: The interfaces of `ABep20` and `ABNB` types are inconsistent, with differences in error handling for functions such as `replayBorrow()`, `repayBorrowBehalf()`, `mint()`, and `liquidateBorrow()`.

findings.title: Suggested Adherence Of Checks-Effects-Interactions Pattern
findings.description: A common coding best practice in Solidity is the adherence of `checks-effects-interactions` principle to mitigate re-entrancy attacks.

findings.title: Possible Front-Running For Unintended Payment In repayBorrowBehalf()
findings.description: The assumption of using repayment amount of -1 to imply full repayment may be taken advantage of to launch a front-running borrow() operation, resulting in a higher borrowing balance for repayment.

findings.title: Deflationary
findings.description: Part of the tokens are burned or transferred as fee while on transfer()/transferFrom() calls

findings.title: Pausable
findings.description: The token contract allows the owner or privileged users to pause the token transfers and other operations

findings.title: Blacklistable
findings.description: The token contract allows the owner or privileged users to blacklist a specific address such that token transfers and other operations related to that address are prohibited

findings.title: Mintable
findings.description: The token contract allows the owner or privileged users to mint tokens to a specific address

findings.title: Burnable
findings.description: The token contract allows the owner or privileged users to burn tokens of a specific address
